Control.Title: Charts
Control.Description: The charts provide a perfect way to visualize data with a high level of user interactivity.

Control.Title: ListView
Control.Description: Displays items in various layouts and groups.

Control.Title: Popup
Control.Description: Enables custom alert messages or loading specific views in a popup.

Control.Title: Expander
Control.Description: Expander is a layout control for toggling UI views in header and content sections with a tap.

Control.Title: Accordion
Control.Description: Vertical collapsible panel with stacked headers for simultaneous expansion or collapse of items.

Control.Title: DataGrid
Control.Description: A full-featured grid control is available, complete with advanced features such as sorting, filtering, and selection.

Control.Title: Chat
Control.Description: Facilitates real-time conversational messaging between users.

Control.Title: TreeView
Control.Description: Displays hierarchical data in an expandable, collapsible tree structure.

Control.Title: Navigation Drawer
Control.Description: The NavigationDrawer is a UI panel that displays app navigation options on the side of the screen.

Control.Title: Radial Menu
Control.Description: The radial menu control is a circular layout for quick navigation to options.

Control.Title: Calendar
Control.Description: It is a lightweight control used to select a single, multiple, and a range of dates.

Control.Title: Scheduler
Control.Description: Allows you to easily visualize and schedule appointments.

Control.Title: Button
Control.Description: A button is a UI element for user interaction, representing a one-click or tap action.

Control.Title: Segmented Control
Control.Description: Offer choices from a linear set of segments, each as an independent button.

Control.Title: Chips
Control.Description: The chips control offers an interactive and customizable layout.

Control.Title: Switch
Control.Description: The switch allows toggling items with an optional indeterminate state.

Control.Title: Picker
Control.Description: A versatile UI element designed for making selections from a set of options.

Control.Title: Date Picker
Control.Description: A user interface element for selecting specific dates.

Control.Title: Time Picker
Control.Description: An interface for choosing specific times of day.

Control.Title: Date Time Picker
Control.Description: A combined interface to select dates and times.

Control.Title: Image Editor
Control.Description: The image editor is used to crop, flip, rotate and annotate an image.

Control.Title: Autocomplete
Control.Description: Provides useful suggestions to users based on the already typed content.

Control.Title: ComboBox
Control.Description: Allows users to select items via typing or choosing from a list.

Control.Title: Masked Entry
Control.Description: Allows users to restrict input using a mask pattern.

Control.Title: Numeric Entry
Control.Description: Allows users to restrict input to numeric values using specified format.

Control.Title: Color Picker
Control.Description: Allows users to select a color using a visual interface such as a color spectrum or palette.

Control.Title: Rich Text Editor
Control.Description: Users can create, format, and edit rich text content with advanced editing tools.

Control.Title: Linear Progress Bar
Control.Description: Indicates the progress of a task along a line.

Control.Title: Step Progress Bar
Control.Description: A multi step progress bar tracks the status of a process.

Control.Title: Slider
Control.Description: The horizontal slider enables you to select a numeric value.

Control.Title: Range Slider
Control.Description: The horizontal range slider enables you to select a numeric range.

Control.Title: Signature Pad
Control.Description: Captures the signature and save it as an image to sync across devices and documents.

Control.Title: Kanban Board
